languages.text: "Дело плохо, но пока живы... Не подходите к этой зверюге, Лорд-капитан! Она вас сожрет!"
"We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "Дело плохо, но пока живы... Не подходите к этой зверюге, Лорд-капитан! Она вас сожрет!"

traits.locale_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"
"We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"
"We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"
"We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"
"We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: "Es ging uns schon besser, aber solange wir am Leben sind ... Haltet Euch von dieser Bestie fern, ehe sie Euch frisst, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Es ging uns schon besser, aber solange wir am Leben sind ... Haltet Euch von dieser Bestie fern, ehe sie Euch frisst, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: « Nous avons connu mieux, mais au moins, nous sommes en vie... Éloignez-vous de cet animal enragé avant qu'il vous dévore, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons connu mieux, mais au moins, nous sommes en vie... Éloignez-vous de cet animal enragé avant qu'il vous dévore, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: 「万全とは言えないが、生きてさえいれば…ロード・キャプテン、その獣に食われる前に離れてください！」
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: 「万全とは言えないが、生きてさえいれば…ロード・キャプテン、その獣に食われる前に離れてください！」

languages.text: «Hemos estado mejor, pero seguimos vivos... ¡Aléjese de esa bestia antes de que le devore, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos estado mejor, pero seguimos vivos... ¡Aléjese de esa bestia antes de que le devore, Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: “我们不太好，但至少还活着……离那头畜生远点，舰长大人，否则它会吃了你！”
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: “我们不太好，但至少还活着……离那头畜生远点，舰长大人，否则它会吃了你！”

languages.text: "Daha iyi günler görmüştük ama hayattayız ya... Kaçın Lord Kaptan, yoksa çiğ çiğ yer sizi!"
languages.original_text: "We've been better, but as long as we're alive... Keep away from that beast before it eats you, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Daha iyi günler gördük ama hayattayız ya... Kaçın Lord Kaptan, yoksa çiğ çiğ yer sizi!"
